DOC.brief_summary: Safety and efficacy studies of rHSA/GCSF fusion protein for injection in treatment of neutropenia induced by chemotherapy of cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Studies of rHSA/GCSF Fusion Protein For Injection to Treat Neutropenia
DOC.detailed_description: A dosage climbing for the safety and efficacy studies for the neutropenia induced by chemotherapy cancer patients Repeat-dose studies for the safety and efficacy studied for the neutropenia.
DOC.criteria: chemotherapy induced neutropenia treated with other biological drugs or other neutropenia therapy drugs
